channel.title: Help me with this ::makedon command please!
channel.description:
:eek: I added a ::makedon command (make donater) and also in the data folder, donaters.txt and it writes them to the file fine. Now how do I make them load it from the file?
NOT A DELTA SOURCE!

item.title: Help me with this ::makedon command please!
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

[quote=“Chemist, post:4, topic:306878”][quote author=Mod Val link=topic=403059.msg2985414#msg2985414 date=1254945543]
:eek: I added a ::makedon command (make donater) and also in the data folder, donaters.txt and it writes them to the file fine. Now how do I make them load it from the file?

NOT A DELTA SOURCE!
[/quote]

Youd have to make it recognise the donater.txt file[/quote]
He knows that, if you would have read his post he said:

[quote=“Mod Val, post:1, topic:306878”]:eek: I added a ::makedon command (make donater) and also in the data folder, donaters.txt and it writes them to the file fine. Now how do I make them load it from the file?

NOT A DELTA SOURCE![/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with this ::makedon command please!
